android.content.res

Class XModuleResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.res.Resources
      • android.content.res.XModuleResources

  • public class XModuleResources
extends android.content.res.Resources
    Resources that can be created for an Xposed module.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.res.Resources

        android.content.res.Resources.NotFoundException, android.content.res.Resources.Theme

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static XModuleResources createInstance(java.lang.String modulePath, XResources origRes)
      Usually called with the automatically injected MODULE_PATH constant of the first parameter and the resources received in the callback for XposedBridge.hookInitPackageResources(de.robv.android.xposed.callbacks.XC_InitPackageResources) (or null for system-wide replacements.
      XResForwarder fwd(int id)
      Create an XResForwarder instances that forwards requests to id in this resource.
